sentences.sContent: The father stood there with his son. Before the latter was the great oculist in the act of cutting away the last bandage.
sentences.sContent_eng: The father stood there with his son. Before the latter was the great oculist in the act of cutting away the last bandage.
sentences.sCn: 父与子都站在那里，新郎面前，站着那位眼科专家，正在割断最后一条绷带。

sentences.sContent: It is also praised high by oculist because it can be used in rectification of children with ametropia besides its convenient wearing method.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is also praised high by oculist because it can be used in rectification of children with ametropia besides its convenient wearing method.
sentences.sCn: 特别是它配戴操作简单，可用于儿童屈光不正的矫正，倍受眼科医师的推崇。

sentences.sContent: The false eyelash of the professional brand such as M -A-C checks through oculist, use more safe.
sentences.sContent_eng: The false eyelash of the professional brand such as M -A-C checks through oculist, use more safe.
sentences.sCn: C 等专业品牌的假睫毛都通过眼科医生测试，使用更加安全。

trans.tranOther: a doctor who examines and treats people’s eyes
